attributes.action: ensure that in future, the blame for disasters such as the recent loss of data by Revenue & Customs, should be placed either upon Senior Civil Servants or Ministers and NOT on "junior staff" acting under insructions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become apparent, particularly during the last few years, that anything that goes wrong in Government Departments and  subsequently gets into the public domain,is invariably blamed on "junior staff" when in reality `junior staff` can only act under instruction. It is beyond time that senior Civil Servants and /or Ministers were held responsible for actions / accidents within their Department.
